item.description: Back in December, Netflix announced that it would be producing a One Piece remake anime that will go by the name of THE ONE PIECE. In a recent livestream by The One Piece Day '24, itâ€™s revealed that the anime features a rather impressive production staff list.Netflix and WIT Studio have brought on Masashi Koizuka, the director of Attack on Titan to direct the series. Taking on the role of assistant director is Hideaki Abe, who has worked as an episode director for Jujutsu Kaisen and also as the key animator for projects such as MobÂ Psycho 100.With the premise of One Piece being adventure and action-heavy, veteran animators such as Ken Imaizumi (Boruto) and Shuhei Fukuda (My Hero Academia) are also on the list of credits. Takatoshi Honda, the animation director for The First Slam Dunk is also on board as the seriesâ€™ chief animation director.Since THE ONE PIECE will be produced by WIT Studio, staff from some of the studio's other noteworthy projects have been brought on to work on this new and exciting series. item.description: Following up on the last update that production has begun for Dr Stone: Science Future, the production team recently announced the animeâ€™s final season is set to release in 2025.The previous season, Dr. Stone: New World, finished airing in December 2023. The last episode set the final arcs in motion as Senku and his crew began the first steps to their space program. Given the length and key events as explored in Boichi and Riichirou Inagakiâ€™s Dr. Stone manga, fans have been concerned whether another two-part season will suffice to end the series.But with the latest announcement, itâ€™s confirmed that Dr. Stone: Science Future will comprise three cours instead.
